benchmark_details.name: Imagery as Inquiry: Exploring a Multimodal Dataset for Conversational Recommendation
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a multimodal dataset where users express preferences through images to request recommendations for books or music that evoke similar feelings to those images. It supports two recommendation tasks: title generation and multiple-choice selection.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate how well AI models understand and provide appropriate recommendations based on multimodal expressions involving images.

data.source: Reddit posts from specific communities requesting recommendations based on images.
data.size: 1,470 requests and 12,208 items for books; 796 requests and 38,204 items for music.
data.annotation: Manual inspection to ensure posts are recommendation requests, with item extraction from comments.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on model performance on the recommendation tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is evaluated using accuracy and how often the generated recommendations include ground truth items.
methodology.baseline_results: The overall best model achieved 67% accuracy on a music selection task.
